sentence in indonesian using the words: Saat musim kemarau, tanah menjadi kering.
english translation: "During the dry season, the ground becomes dry."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Banyak orang menonton film untuk menghibur diri.
english translation: "Many people watch movies to entertain themselves."

english translation: "I went to the post office to deliver the letter."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kabar itu telah dibicarakan oleh banyak orang.
english translation: "The news has been talked about by many people."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia harus bergegas agar tidak terlambat.
english translation: "She had to hurry so she wouldn't be late."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Belajar matematika dengan malas-malasan sama saja percuma.
english translation: "Studying math lazily is just useless."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hubungan persahabatan mereka memiliki kaitan yang erat.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memelihara anjing yang sangat lincah.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin nonton bioskop malam ini.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sementara itu, ayah sedang memasak.
english translation: "Meanwhile, dad is cooking."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya tinggal di bagian barat kota.
english translation: "I live in the western part of the city."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jembatan ini menghubungkan dua kota yang berbeda.
english translation: "This bridge connects two different cities."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Air es berasa sangat menyegarkan di hari yang panas ini.
english translation: "I feel very refreshed drinking ice water on this hot day."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pengaruhnya sangat besar dalam pembentukan kebijakan ini.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya masih memiliki beberapa buku lainnya yang belum dibaca.
english translation: "I still have several other books that I haven't read."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan hanya diam, mari ngobrol.
english translation: "Don't just stay quiet, let's chat."
